    • Rev_rep_list
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Rev_rep_list
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Store the revenue reports of one year.

      • addRevReport

        public void addRevReport(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> menuItemIDs,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> promoSetIDs,
                         double total,
                         java.util.Date date,
                         Menu menu,
                         PromoSet promoSet)
        Add an order to the revenue report
        Parameters:
        menuItemIDs - List of menu item which is going to be added to the report.
        promoSetIDs - List of promo item which is going to be added to the report.
        total - The total price of the added items.
        date - The date of the order.

      • printReport

        public void printReport(int start,
                        int end,
                        Menu menu,
                        PromoSet promoSet)
        Print the revenue report from a given range of time. Month is given 0-based.
        Parameters:
        start - The starting month.
        end - The ending month.
        menu - The class which contains all the menu id.
        promoSet - The class which contains all the promoSet id.

      • printReport

        public void printReport(Menu menu,
                        PromoSet promoSet)
        Print all the revenue report from the beginning to the end of month.
        Parameters:
        menu - The class which contains all the menu id.
        promoSet - The class which contains all the promoSet id.
